template.p: This industry is tailor-made for construction businesses that excel in managing construction projects. It encompasses the crucial stages of project conceptualization, accurate quotation(s), seamless project kick-off, meticulous planning, streamlined (re)supply, flawless execution, effective collaboration with third parties, meticulous budget follow-up, prompt invoicing, and exceptional customer service.
Odoo empowers you to manage every aspect of your construction projects effortlessly and efficiently, and its integrated applications ensure unparalleled success and client satisfaction.

template.p: The CRM application allows you to collect requests from your potential customers by aggregating several sources:

ul.li: Create an opportunity each time you face a potential customer, receive a phone call, etc.
Redirect the emails sent to info@my-construction-business.com to the CRM.
Use the Website app to create a contact form that will redirect all the requests to the CRM.

template.p: Take advantage of every opportunity. The CRM centralizes everything and allows you to ensure the follow-up of each request efficiently. If the request becomes concrete, create the customer in the Contact app.
At any time, you can create from an opportunity a beautiful and tailor-made quotation that displays the price, the discount, the unit of measure, and the tax of each:

ul.li: Material that will be used to build the project.
Service such as labor hours, traveling costs, etc.

div.p: If you want to push your quotation building much further and add all the power of Spreadsheet beneath any line of your Sales Orders, use the quote calculation feature.

template.p: Of course, feel free to create all the products you use often. This will save you time when preparing when preparing your next quotations.

div.class: o_editor_banner o_not_editable lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3

div.p: If your country benefits from a tax rebate under certain conditions, you can easily apply it to your entire quotation by creating a fiscal position that will automatically replace the default tax rate by the reduced one

template.p: Save time by directly sending the quotation by email to your customer. The personalized email provides:

ul.li: A link to reach the online quotation from where the customer can confirm and sign it.

template.p: If the customer replies to the email, the answer is automatically logged in the chatter on the right of the screen. Thereby, all the discussions regarding the quotation, its updates, and its fine tuning are attached, and the history can be easily consulted by all the involved users
Once confirmed, the quotation becomes a sales order. All quotations and sales orders are centralized in the Sales app.
template.h2: Centralize all the important information ğŸ“
template.p: Starting a construction project implies a lot of important documents such as contracts, building plans, instructions for use, subcontracting agreements, etc. Instead of scattering them in your emails, storage services or computer, attach them in the chatter and they will be automatically centralized in the Documents app.
Speed up the signing process thanks to the Sign app. Once again, all the signed documents will be stored in the Documents app.

template.p: The quotation confirmation automatically triggers the creation of a dedicated project in the... Project app! Each project is initiated with several default tasks, such as:
Of course, these default tasks can be adapted in the Project Template according to your personal way of managing a construction project.
Assign the tasks to the right responsible and easily check the progress in the Kanban view.

template.h2: Keep an eye on materials ğŸ“¦
template.p: Before starting the project, make sure you have enough stock. The confirmation of the quotation also triggers the creation of a delivery in the Inventory app where you can check the stock levels of each needed storable product.

If the stock levels are too low, resupply the materials from the Purchase app by creating a purchase order linked to the right vendor. In the Contact app, you can easily manage all your preferred vendors and don't hesitate to set a warning to remind if there is a minimum amount to get free transport costs.
For each ordered material, don't forget to fill the analytic distribution in which you will be able to set for which project it will be used.
Use the Planning app to organize the work of your employees. Define on which project and when they have to work. Easily manage shift conflicts, workload and replacements in case of leaves.
Record the time spent by your employees on each project by using the Timesheets app. Don't forget to define a hourly cost on the employee form.
template.h2: ğŸ“ˆ Invoice the right amount at the right time
template.p: The Invoicing App ensures timely billing, automate recurring invoices, and integrate with project milestones.

ul.li: Invoice from Quotation: Convert approved quotes into invoices.
Billing: Invoice based on work completion or project milestones.
Payment Tracking: Monitor outstanding client payments.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3

div.p: Schedule one or several "Invoicing Schedule" activities on the sales order with the aim to never forget to send an intermediary invoice in order to sustain your cash flow.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3 o-contenteditable-false

div.p: Before generating an intermediary invoice, capture a project update from its dashboard.

template.p: Typically, work items products are priced in a scale-able fashion and billed based on delivered quantity. Those are defined as service products with invoicing based on manual delivery.

ul.li: From the project, expose all related aspects you want to have at fingertips with the slider icon (ğŸšï¸).
Open the Progress view. It captures all sale order lines associated to this project.
For each line, adjust the increment fields to capture delivered work since last invoice.
Once at the periodic billing moment, select those lines and trigger the delivery update. This will update sale order to capture those increments and create a draft invoice.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-info pb-0 pt-3 o-contenteditable-false

div.p: Pro tip: Set progress increment directly on a section to go faster!

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3

div.p: This manual progress view is as well available from the sale order, in the Progress tab!

template.p: Some other work items will be invoiced given the amount of time spent. The time sheet do not only help you keep track of your costs, they as well are the lever to charge your customers. Those are defined as service products with invoicing based on time sheets.

div.class: o_editor_banner user-select-none o-contenteditable-false lh-1 d-flex align-items-center alert alert-success pb-0 pt-3

div.p: As soon as time sheets associated to sale order lines are approved, the recorded time is used as delivery metric!

template.p: During and after the construction project, provide a five star customer service by answering the questions from your customer through the Helpdesk app. All the emails sent to help@industry-construction.odoo.com will create a ticket that can be assigned to ensure the follow-up.

If a technical operation such as a repair is needed, directly create a task in the Field Service project from a ticket. Then assign it and schedule it to quickly solve the problem. Your employee will be able to use some material to fix the issue. Then these materials and the time spent could be invoiced to the customer.
